about.heading: About Me
about.description: I am an MBA candidate and experienced Software Engineer based in Munich with a background in aerospace, cloud-native systems, and strategic innovation. My work focuses on DevSecOps, CI/CD pipelines, automation, and infrastructure for complex applications. Through roles at ASMPT, ALTEN, and MdynamiX, I’ve developed a robust ability to blend technical expertise with strategic vision.
